author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
name: hail2u.net

scripts.css: node bin/css.js && node bin/style-guide.js && cp -rTu tmp/ dist/css/ && cp tmp/main.min.css src/partial/css.mustache && cp -rTu src/css/ dist/css/
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.img: node bin/icon.js && cp src/img/logo.svg src/partial/logo.mustache && cp -rTu src/img/ dist/img/
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
scripts.version: npm run css && npm run js && npm run img && npm run github && npm run documents && npm run pub
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm run html -- --articles && npm run deploy
scripts.predeploy: npm run html && npm run feed
scripts.precss: npm run test_css && npm run clear && cd dist && rm -fr css/ && mkdir css
scripts.preimg: npm run clear && cd dist && rm -fr img/ && mkdir img
scripts.prejs: npm run test_js && npm run clear && cd dist && rm -fr js/ && mkdir js
